overview: Nancy manages the US operations for a major video compression software technology company based in Paris, France. She has more than 15 years of experience at high technology companies in a variety of sales, marketing, and business development roles. Prior to joining Actimagine, she successfully launched new wireless technology and interactive game divisions for the largest localization company. Previously, Nancy was Director of Carrier Relations for Europe and Latin America, where she handled the worldwide management of wireless content strategy and acquisition for a top tier wireless social networking website. While living and working in Europe for ten years, she spearheaded the introduction of Apple Computer hardware solutions into the major corporations and publishing companies in Southern Europe, and later joined Aldus Software to setup and manage subsidiaries in Italy, Spain and France. Nancy has a Bachelors Degree in Liberal Arts and a marketing diploma from Harvard University.
